question: Which explains how the epithelium offers protection to land-dwelling vertebrates?
candidate_answers: (A) Epithelium provides a rigid shell to prevent punctures. (B) Epithelium has capillaries to resist iron deficiency. (C) Epithelium insulates the vertebrate from hypothermia. (D) Epithelium prevents dehydration in vertebrates.
answer: Epithelium provides a rigid shell to prevent punctures.
label: A
